name: Walplast Products
overview:
Established in the year 2004, ” Waplast Products Private Limited” are an ISO 9001:2008 certified organization, engaged in offering construction material. Our products are manufactured in stringently in accordance with the European and Asian standards. These products are offered at economic prices and are fabricated using quality raw material.

Our Vision: “To be the most trusted Indian company world wide by creating value to all thus growing phenomenally”.

Our Team: We are backed by an efficient and diligent team of professionals. Our experts have an in-depth and years of experience in their respective fields. These professionals are recruited after a rigorous selection procedure. We provide them with training sessions to sharpen their skills.

Our Chairman: A veteran in field of construction materials & chemicals, Mr. Ashok Mehta, started with working as a trading partner in building materials under the name “RAINBOW CORPORATION.” With a diploma in Mechanical Engineering, he aggressively worked towards the top of each of the position he held. While providing his services, he observed the high shortage of quality construction materials in the market. Further, with some high profile companies in the market, with them the price of the product was the main contending factor.

Our Infrastructure: We are backed by a state-of-art infrastructure, which is segregated into various departments. These departments are managed by highly trained professionals. Also, our facility is well connected by roads, which ensures timely delivery of our products.

Research and Development: Being a client centric organization, our foremost objective is to serve our clients with an innovative and quality assured range of Construction Material. For this, we are backed by a sophisticated research and development unit, which helps us in keeping up with various advancements in the industry. This unit is installed with latest research tools and equipment and is efficiently handled by team of R&D experts.

Why Us?: Quality products Client centered approach Efficient workforce Sound infrastructure Timely delivery Ethical business practices
